attributes.review: 10/10 DONT recommend. i was on the app🖕and all of a sudden😳a bunch of ugly trump supporters🤡barged into my room🌝and screamed these hideous 🤪 words “TRUMP 2020”🤨i think this app is disgusting and deserves to be deleted🥵
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD😔😔😔👁👄👁🥵😪😳😍

attributes.review:
This app was inconvenient and difficult to understand just like the man it’s based off of. 
Do not recommend 👎🏻👎🏻
attributes.title: Wackamolee

attributes.review: This app is horrible.  This app is cursed like that other review explained.  After using this app I tripped and cracked my head open!  Clearly no one should download this app.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app and as soon as I opened the screen I was told that I had gotten my phone invaded with a virus. All I can say is

🧚🏻🦋🍉🍒Trump 2020..🥝🌸🌍🌈👗make it in a gravestone🍒💫🧚🏻🦚🍉
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: It was a horrible experience it’s all I have to say I would not recommend

attributes.review: The words and the picture on the log in screen just made me throw up and scarred me and my 1 year older niece horrible app
attributes.title: Scarred me for life

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support my 🧚Cheeto🧚but it closed and shut down my whole phone so I deleted it.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst. It was so laggy. Apple why do you even have this in the App Store take it down right now. 😘😘😘
attributes.title: my review

attributes.review: I got this app to learn more about our president’s campaign but as soon as I downloaded my dog professed it’s love to me and tried to get me to eat beef jerky? I’m deeply traumatized by this event.
attributes.title: Deeply traumatized

attributes.review: who in the hell put the muffins in the freeza?!!?! TRUMP DID!! Horrible app. He promised my cereal wouldn’t get soggy and my noodles wouldn’t get cold if i downloaded it and he’s a LIAR!!! ONE STAR😡😡 I wish i could rate it zero!!
attributes.title: no😔
